creator: dmont@etrade.ca
text:
tar xvf jakarta-log4j-1.1.3.tar returns the following on Solaris 2.6:
tar: directory checksum error

When viewing the file under Windows using WinZip or WinAce I see
several files which have been either truncated or scrambled at path
lengths of 100 chars:

PatternParser$CategoryPatternConverter.cla100644
PatternParser$ClassNamePatternConverter.cl100644
PatternParser$LiteralPatternConverter.clas100644
PatternParser$LocationPatternConverter.cla100644

The zip file is fine.
